amendment.description: To provide that the Act may not be construed to infringe upon the sovereignty of Pakistan to combat militant or terrorist groups operating inside the boundaries of Pakistan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1467 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1467 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S8781; text: CR S8781) To provide that the Act may not be construed to infringe upon the sovereignty of Pakistan to combat militant or terrorist groups operating inside the boundaries of Pakistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1467 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Burr.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1467 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
